about.name: Kirubel Adamu
about.short_description: I am Kirubel Adamu. I am a Junior Software Engineer recently graduated from Addis Ababa Science and Technology University. I am passionate about developing mobile apps to simplify user's daily life and taking part in the gaming industry to tailor popular video games to the culture I grew upon. Currently I am working as a Mobile Application Developer at SafariCom.et. I am working with flutter and Native Java to develop, maintain and test various applications my company currently has deployed
